title: Hallmark Shoebox Cancer Support Card Assortment (6 Cards with Envelopes) (1499RZG1002)
features: When friends or family are going through a tough time, a handwritten card can make all the difference. Keep this pack of cards on hand to brighten someone's day as they fight the good fight.
Printed on high-quality paper stock, this card set includes 6 encouraging cards, each a unique design, and 6 envelopes.
Designs in this pack of cards are perfect for giving someone a good laugh, encouraging them through the bad days, and just letting them know you're thinking of them.
Cards measure 5" x 7.2." All Hallmark greeting cards are made with paper from well-managed forests.
Shoebox greeting cards are the perfect way to make someone laugh out loud. These edgy, irreverent takes on life are surprising, hilarious, often inappropriate and always timely.
description: When friends or family have serious illnesses, there's not always much you can do. One important thing, though, is just letting them know they're being thought of, that they're cared about, and that you're rooting for them. The cards in this pack are perfect for doing just that. The Hallmark brand is widely recognized as the very best for greeting cards, gift wrap, and more. For over 100 years, Hallmark has been helping its customers make everyday moments more beautiful and celebrations more joyful.
